name: "Trauma Cycle.33" An Experimental Film about PTSD.
blurb: This film explores the issue of Post Traumatic Stress in America, it depicts a story of healing for Veterans, and our communities.

name: Gill & Gill: a film comparing bouldering & stone carving
blurb: A visual essay exploring humanity's relationship with stone by juxtaposing 2 masters: one of rock climbing, the other of letter cutting

name: 21st Century Play
blurb: Dr. Leroy Jenkins teaches theater history in the year 2095. His personal struggle is tragicomic, absurd, and total. Theater art.

name: Camel Camel - 2015 International Tour
blurb: Macabre comedy "Camel Camel" will harness the unbridled horse of original theatre on a 2015 tour in Canada and the USA. Help us!

name: I GRANT I AM A WOMAN: Shakespeare based Original Work on CD
blurb: A Spoken Concept Album on CD with Original Soundtrack exploring the feminine perspective through Shakespeare’s words recontextualized

name: THE FLOATONES 2015 AT LA MAMA
blurb: THE FLOATONES, a play by late downtown theater legend, Jim Neu, makes a comeback at La MaMa 20 years later with an all new cast.

name: You On The Moors Now
blurb: An original Off-Off Broadway play that draws on the works of Jane Austen, the Bronte sisters, and Louisa May Alcott.

name: Mystery Mark
blurb: A cartoon exorcism! An illustrated book and performance about letting go, in which an anxious man is stalked by his childhood TV hero.

name: Mermaid's Howl
blurb: Marina Celander's searingly beautiful solo play Mermaid's Howl is going to Stockholm Fringe! The wolf mother’s time has come at last.

name: Lemon Eyes Film Festival Submission Campaign 2017
blurb: Be a part of submitting our completed 1920's Detroit-era dramatic short "Lemon Eyes" to film festivals in 2017, including Sundance!

name: The Road to Hollywood
blurb: Webseries documenting a NYC actress on a road trip to Hollywood! The catch? Book a gig in each city before she can advance to the next!

name: Spirit Drawing: Tales Of The Phantasmagoric Skull
blurb: An Art Adventure in a Magicians' Lair with Olivia De Berardinis & Thomas Kuntz

name: crushAustin
blurb: Rude Mechs will produce one event in each of Austin's 10 City Council Districts. We are bringing our work to YOU.

name: BAD TASTE - THE FILTHIEST SHOW IN CHICAGO
blurb: Chicago's most daring and disgusting performance art! Burlesque, drag, clowning, sideshow, cosplay, and queer+campy curiosities!

name: Hamlet: What Dreams May Come at The Brick
blurb: Hamlet: What Dreams May Come by Adam Mathias at The Brick as part of the Shakespeare in the Theater Festival this August.

name: Epic opera for the modern world
blurb: Creating a brand new epic opera based on an Armenian folktale, blending live performance with digital audio-visual art.

name: Bernice, Too
blurb: From the maniacs that brought you "HEAD - Horror The Elmwood Way" comes "BERNICE, TOO" Art Film The Elmwood Way.

name: Little Lord’s SKINNAMARINK
blurb: Help bring this "Savage Piece for Savage Times" to NYTW this March!

name: Ritual4Return
blurb: Ritual4Return is a 12-week rite of passage for formerly incarcerated men in NYC... Art, healing, transformation, movement-building.

name: EstroGenius Festival 2020!
blurb: Our 20th year of celebrating female identifying + non-binary artists in dance, theater, music and art.

name: VIRGINIA/POE, a new play
blurb: A surreal, anti-historical drama, VIRGINIA/POE explores the life and legacy of Virginia Clemm, the child bride of Edgar Allan Poe.

name: (im)pure
blurb: A mental-health centered short film about "Pure O" OCD.

name: Tuesday Film
blurb: An experimental, narrative short following a girl who decides to make a film to document all the beautiful things she sees.

name: Heinous Investigations Podcast Season 2
blurb: The second season of the silly, spooky, self-referential scripted podcast!
